original_text: When this happened, all the brothers were very upset. They tore their clothes. Then they put their bags back on their donkeys. They returned to the city.
korean_text: 그들이 옷을 찢고 각기 짐을 나귀에 싣고 성으로 돌아 가니라

sentences.original_text: all the brothers were very upset
Then they put their bags back on their donkeys
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 자신들의 가방을 다시 나귀 위에 올렸다
